projects.name: Smart Calculator
projects.description: Created a fundamental iOS calculator using Xcode and SwiftUI, unlocking a deep understanding of both tools. This personal project immersed me in Xcode's functionality, allowing me to grasp its intricacies. I honed my skills in SwiftUI syntax and functions, becoming proficient in crafting user interfaces for iOS applications. This hands-on experience illuminated the path from project inception to coding, testing, and deployment, providing clarity on iOS development processes. Overall, this undertaking served as a pivotal learning experience, solidifying my foundation in iOS app development and showcasing my ability to swiftly absorb and apply new technologies, setting the stage for future projects in the iOS ecosystem.

projects.name: Analysis and Prediction of VBDs : Dengue (Research Project)
projects.description: I collaborated with three peers to develop a novel dataset encompassing climate parameters and dengue cases in various Indian locations. Utilizing state-of-the-art machine learning algorithms, we crafted a predictive model to assess the impact of climate change on vector-borne diseases, with a focus on dengue outbreaks. Our project not only involves model comparison but also offers the ability to forecast future dengue cases based on weather forecasts. This initiative showcases my dedication to interdisciplinary research and data-driven solutions for public health challenges.
